mainSequence.step: ERDMP prompts Depositor to link with DMP.
Depositor provides DMP reference to ERDMP.
ERDMP requests DMP details from DMPT.
DMPT queries DMP by reference from DMPRepo.
DMPRepo returns DMP details to DMPT.
DMPT provides DMP details to ERDMP.
ERDMP links dataset with DMP in DatasetRepo.
DatasetRepo updates DMP with dataset link.
DatasetRepo confirms dataset-DMP linkage to ERDMP.
ERDMP confirms dataset linked with DMP to Depositor.
